## Data repartition

```{r}
require(ggplot2)
table(data_NIRS_raw$`Growth condition`, data_NIRS_raw$`N regime`)

eq <- function(x) {
  data_NIRS_raw  |> 
  ggplot() + aes(x = x) +
  geom_bar()
}

plot1 <- eq(data_NIRS_raw$`Growth season`)
plot2 <- eq(data_NIRS_raw$`Growth condition`)
plot3 <- eq(data_NIRS_raw$`N regime`)
plot4 <- eq(data_NIRS_raw$`W regime`)
plot5 <- eq(data_NIRS_raw$`Tissue`)

library(cowplot)
plot_grid(plot1, plot2, plot3, plot4, plot5)
```
